caption.p: The contents of six representative secondary metabolites (mg/g dry weight (dw)) in Gentiana asclepiadea by 12 groups of samples (original, nontransformed data): Vlasina aboveground plant parts (V1A, V2A, V3A), Vlasina belowground plant parts (V1B, V2B, V3B), Golija aboveground plant parts (G1A, G2A, G3A), Golija belowground plant parts (G1B, G2B, G3B). Boxplot major features (bottom to top): minimum value, box (interquartile range), and maximum value. Horizontal bar inside a box is median. Cross inside a box is mean value. Vertical bar is range.
